data.text: @FareezyCheesy From what we’ve seen, yes. And a huge chunk of that has been relying on existing properties.

@Megatran_ Probably a failure to separate the creative team and the inherent worth of the property when they still find a way to make money with mediocre efforts. They only ever make changes when the box office comes in low.

@CoupNBA Probably just a bunch of behind the scenes politics but never understood why these studios are so committed to certain people. Kinda like WB/DC and Zack Snyder. Like wtf has Snyder ever accomplished that so much faith would be given to him?
@CoupNBA I'd say he's serviceable at best?
@CoupNBA so many better options, can’t see why they settled on him
@brad_schwartz Definitely someone to entrust a billion dollar franchise trilogy with.
@CoupNBA imo he’s bad at both writing and directing, but not unwatchably bad. passable but uninspired
